entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
WINDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 25 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
